name: CONTACT (itch) (Ar🖤💎)
description:
CONTACT

An interactive story in which you need to find your way out of a weird situation. The game works best when you run it in full-screen mode. Just click the 'full screen' icon in the bottom right-hand corner.

This is my first ever Twine game so go easy on me!  I still need to tweak it in places and visually it's not as attractive as I'd like but I'm still learning how to use Twine at this point. Again, possibly not my greatest writing either but I've tried to focus more on actually learning how to use the tool in order to get something made. Hopefully, you'll enjoy it though :)
